issue.subject: Unable to publish/unpublish/trash/archive on Joomla! 3.9.1
issue.description:
Unable to publish/unpublish/trash/archive on Joomla! 3.9.1 Related : https://github.com/joomla/joomla-cms/issues/23204 https://github.com/joomla/joomla-cms/pull/23200 https://github.com/joomla/joomla-cms/pull/22851 For now on the state column MUST be named "published" *OR* MUST be aliased to "published" using something in table class like : 

    public function __construct(&$db) {
        $this->setColumnAlias('published', 'state');
    }
